The claim can be broken down into two main assertions:
1. James E. Baechtold was the coach in the year 1965.

Row 4 is the only row where James E. Baechtold is listed as the coach, confirming that he was indeed the only coach in an Ohio Valley conference year within this dataset.

Based on these observations, both assertions are supported by the data:

- He did not coach any other year for the Ohio Valley conference listed in the table.
